Грязная помойка с читерами, вылетами, дудосами и абсолютно ноль поддержки разработчиков, Гейб соси гнида. Если вам нравится копаться в говне, то рекомендую. 10 выигранных каток и 1 проигранная = понижение, как я ошибался - это не помойка, а настоящая навозная яма.
Ich kann das spiel nur weiter empfehlen
Spent so many hours on this amazing game, id recommend to anyone looking for a strategic shooter!

Bought this game when you could, dont really like the whole f2p method but dont mind. kinda fun 7/10

CS:GO is one of those games that you will either love it or hate it.

I, on the other hand, managed to feel both love and hate, at first only love, then a combination of the two and now only hatred.

You cannot simply play this game casually. You either go hard on competitive or you play something else. Managed to reach a decent Supreme Master First Class Rank after like 500+ hours, got bored of its repetitiveness and dumped it.

Also learned to speak Russian. Would normally recommend, not anymore as per the last decision of Valve to give it out for free.
наманая такая стрылялочка, правда читеров много.
its a good game to play if you like to compete and if you just like to have a good time
Counterstrike Global Offensive or CSGO is one of the best fps. It has a high learning curve and it is extremely satisfying to get that headshot. 11/10 good gmae
This is the only game i play
VERY     GOOD      GAME     NAHUI    I    LIKE      IT

I've played CSGO for a few years now. VAC doesn't work. Hackers are rampant even in "prime". They don't care about banning hackers, they only care about cashing in on skins. When you report someone it takes a really long time to get them checked out. Its no fun out of 5 games you play you'll probably only find one clean game. Goodbye CSGO it was fun while it lasted.
с каждым годом все хуже и хуже.....
